title: Variants located in intron 6 of SMN1 lead to misdiagnosis in genetic detection and screening for SMA
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Yujin Qu, Jinli Bai, Hui Jiao, Hong Qi, Wenchen Huang, Shijia OuYang, Xiaoyin Peng, Yuwei Jin, Hong Wang, Fang Song
